entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 5:15 PM PDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
